div.a: Message from Superintendent Bill Vonada on the extended school closure

div.p:
Cranberry Area School District's purpose, in partnership with our community, is to engage, educate and inspire our students to pursue their greatest potential.
3 Education Drive, Seneca, PA 16346 • Phone: 814-676-5628 Fax: 814-677-5728
